name: Low Poly Vehicles Controller DEMO
description:
Lite version of the "Low Poly Vehicles Controller" on the Unity Asset Store.

Try 8 different vehicles in this simple scene, with different projectiles and fire rates! 

You can see wheeled & tracked vehicles in action!

With a 1250m long range, 3 pods shooting range, a suspension test track, and a mines track,

 you can really test out the asset over 3 different angles!

Have fun!
